tool.name: Compute otuphyl
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING**. This tool requires **otu.Rdata file** get in *Process Otu file* tool. It also needs a p-value by the user in *Pvalue cutoff* in the selectable top box.
**What does it do?**\
This tool transforms *.otu.Rdata* file into *otuphyl* file and *.DEresult.Rdata* the latter to create taxa differentially abundance.\
User can select P-value cutoff to set a significance value.\
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING** It is important to select correctly the type of file: *.Rdatafile*.
